choices.A: Use EC2 instances in a single Availability Zone.
choices.B: Use Amazon CloudFront as the database for the EC2 instances.
choices.D: Use EC2 instances in the same edge location and the same AWS Region.
choices.C: Use EC2 instances in the same edge location and the same Availability Zone.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Use EC2 instances in a single Availability Zone.

questions.question_text:
A company wants to minimize network latency between its Amazon EC2 instances. The EC2 instances do not need to be highly available.

Which solution meets these requirements?

An ecommerce company wants to provide relevant product recommendations to its customers. The recommendations will include products that are frequently purchased with other products that the customer already purchased. The recommendations also will include products of a specific color and products from the customerâ€™s favorite brand.

Which AWS service or feature should the company use to meet these requirements with the LEAST development effort?

discussion.content:

questions.question_text:
A company wants to migrate to the AWS Cloud. The company needs the ability to acquire resources when the resources are necessary. The company also needs the ability to release those resources when the resources are no longer necessary.

Which architecture concept of the AWS Cloud meets these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Elasticity

Selected Answer: A
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/whitepapers/latest/reactive-systems-on-aws/elastic.html

Selected Answer: BE
Platform
The Platform perspective helps you build an enterprise-grade, scalable, hybrid cloud platform, modernize existing workloads, and implement new cloud-native solutions. Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.
https://aws.amazon.com/cloud-adoption-framework/

Selected Answer: BE
B. IT architects
E. Engineers

Selected Answer: BE
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/whitepapers/latest/overview-aws-cloud-adoption-framework/platform-perspective.html

Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

Selected Answer: BE
Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

This time, Error in the question :-) . 

If Question is "Which options are NOT common stakeholders" then option B and E is valid.

Refer Governance section (for common stakeholders) in https://aws.amazon.com/cloud-adoption-framework/

Selected Answer: BC
B. IT architects: IT architects play a crucial role in designing and implementing the cloud architecture and infrastructure. They are responsible for ensuring that the platform meets the organization's technical requirements and aligns with best practices.

C. Chief information officers (CIOs): CIOs are responsible for the overall IT strategy and decision-making within an organization. They play a key role in driving the adoption of cloud technologies and overseeing the successful implementation of cloud initiatives.

questions.question_text: Which options are common stakeholders for the AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF) platform perspective? (Choose two.)
